name: The Open Sky
description:
The sky has fallen, the caretaker will repair it

A game made for the Global Game Jam 2020 (with additional features added afterwards). Link to the GGJ page with the original executable: https://globalgamejam.org/2020/games/open-sky-0

Team
Igor Graszkiewicz - Programmer

Sarah Bradley - Programmer (https://s-ann-br.itch.io/)

Amir Akhtar-Gordon - Programmer

Mikey Parsons - Composer (https://www.mikeyparsons.com/)

Mame-Yaa Bonsu - Producer

Ben Douglas-Almond - Sound Designer (https://douglabe.itch.io/)

Elizabeth Orji-Smith - Artist (Game hosted on my itch page)
